name: query InfluxDB for Event+dir median DetectedObjectVelocity
create Frigate /api/subLabel request to event for speed
mongo cumulative events today by object
show object counts/speeds (5-min) last 60-min in zone_radar
calc direction, speed on frigate event
format influxdb write TimedSpeedCounts
variables to pass
info:
Via Docker Environment 
- `device_ip` of Pi (for influxDB server)  --- env.get("VAR_DEVICE_IP")
- `location` string (for influxDB `location` tag)  --- env.get("VAR_LOCATION")
- `radar_camera` name of camera (for attaching speeds to events) - needs to match Frigate config  --- env.get("VAR_RADAR_CAMERA")  
- `influxdb_database`   --- env.get("VAR_INFLUXDB_BUCKET")

name: format influxdb write DetectedObjectVelocity
init: set radar time (in seconds), after 0.2
init: base settings and filters, after 0.1
init: PI, idle power mode for settings
init: PA, active power mode after settings, after 1
format influxdb write raw speed, magnitude
handle O3 speeds by saving array to each _value
format influxdb write raw speed, magnitude single
manually take top 1 speed, magnitude (effectively O1)
calculate direction based on frigate event zones
create influxdb query, return DetectedObjectVelocity median
join Event+Radar
